metadata.title: CVE-2024-11233 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In PHP versions 8.1.* before 8.1.31, 8.2.* before 8.2.26, 8.3.* before8.3.14, due to an error inÂ convert.quoted-printable-decode filter certaindata can lead to buffer overread by one byte, which can in certaincircumstances lead to crashes or disclose content of other memory areas.

criterions.comment: php8.1 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
